name: Cross Road
description:
This project is a frogger clone but redesigned in my own way. It was a first year project at university, where I utilised SFML and C++ to create this game. All the artwork is my own creation.

Due to the age of this code (around 5 to 6 years) it is currently resource intensive enough to even compile it for windows as was working with an old code base. This means this game will not be released on any other platform other than windows unfortunately, usually I keep my games up to date with system upgrades and such but this one was different as it was in my earlier days of development when I did not have good strategies in place.
